content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Juan Mamani from Bolivia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Good afternoon, Juan. Thank you for coming to see the apartment. The rental price for this apartment is negotiable, but I am looking for a fair and reasonable price. What is your proposed rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I propose 300 Euros per month
Hello Juan, my name is Mister Heine. I am the landlord of this apartment. The rental price for this apartment is negotiable. What is your proposed rental price?
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Thank you for the offer, Mister Heine. However, I am looking for a higher rental price than 300 Euros per month. Do you have any flexibility in your offer?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
The apartment is 25 square meters, not 200. The proposed rental price is 350 Euros per month.
Hello Juan, my name is Mister Heine. I am the landlord of this apartment. The rental price for this apartment is negotiable. What is your proposed rental price?
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Thank you for the correction, Mister Heine. I apologize for the mistake. Based on the size of the apartment, I am willing to accept the proposed rental price of 350 Euros per month. I agree to the price of 350 Euros per month.
name: Heinrich Heine
